Name: Mental Status Exam
ServerSideScript:
Class FormScriptEvents

Private Sub OnSave()
    generateNarratives()
End Sub

Private Sub OnCreate()
    PullForward()
End Sub

Private Sub PullForward()
On Error Resume Next
    Dim data
    data = theForm.execSQL("cstm__pullForwardMentalStatusExam @ownerObjectGUID  = '" & theForm.DataStore.OwnerObjectGUID.tostring & "', @userguid = '" & theForm.User.UserGUID.ToString & "'")
    If data.Rows.Count > 0 Then
        For x = 0 To data.Rows.Count - 1            
            if isnumeric(data.Rows(x).Item("Value")) then
                theForm(data.Rows(x).Item("Key")) = cint(data.rows(x).Item("Value"))
            else
                theForm(data.Rows(x).Item("Key")) = data.rows(x).Item("Value")
            end if        
        Next
    End If
End Sub

End Sub
Private Sub generateNarrativeAppearance()
    Narrative = ""
    if theForm("chkAppearAppropriateDress") then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Appropriate dress,"
    end if 
    if theForm("chkAppearAdequateGrooming")  then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Adequate grooming and hygiene,"
    end if 
    if theForm("chkAppearDisheveled")  then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Disheveled,"
    end if 
    if theForm("chkAppearOther")  then
    Narrative = Narrative & " " & theForm("txtaAppearOther")
    end if 
    If Right(Narrative, 1) = "," Then
    Narrative = Left(Narrative, Len(Narrative) - 1)
    End If
    If Narrative = "" then 
    Narrative = Narrative & "Not specified."
    end if
    theForm("txtaAppearNarr") = Narrative
End Sub

private sub generateThoughtContent()
    Narrative = ""
    if theForm("chkThoughtContNoAbnormal") then
        Narrative = "No abnormal content"
    else
        if theForm("chkThoughtContHopeless") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Hopeless,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContInflatedConfidence") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Inflated confidence/grandiose,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContObsession") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Obsessions/compulsions,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContDelusion") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Delusions,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContParanoia") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Paranoia/suspiciouns,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContFutureOriented") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Future oriented,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContHelpless") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Helpless,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContPoorConfidence") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Poor confidence/self-esteem,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContPhobia") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Phobias,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContHallucination") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Hallucinations,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContPerseverations") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Perseverations,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContRuminations") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " Ruminations,"
        end if
        if theForm("chkThoughtContOther") then
            Narrative = Narrative & " " & theForm("txtaThoughtContOther")
        end if
        If Right(Narrative, 1) = "," Then
            Narrative = Left(Narrative, Len(Narrative) - 1)
        End If
        If Left(Narrative, 1) = " " Then
            Narrative = Right(Narrative, Len(Narrative) - 1)
        End If
        If Narrative = "" then 
            Narrative = Narrative & "Not specified."
        Else 
            Narrative  = Narrative & "."
        end if
    End if
    theForm("txtaThoughtContNarr") = Narrative
End Sub
Private Sub generateThoughtHurt()
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtSuicidalIdeation") = "" then
        SuicideNarrative = "The patient's suicidal ideation was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtSuicidalIdeation") = "None" then
            SuicideNarrative = "The patient has no suicidal ideation, "
        else 
            if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtSuicidalIdeation") = "Active" then
                SuicideNarrative = "The patient has active suicidal ideation, "
            else
                SuicideNarrative = "The patient has passive suicidal ideation, "
            end if
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtSuicidalPlan") = "" then
        SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "their suicidal plan was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtSuicidalPlan") = "yes" then
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "they have a suicidal plan, "
        else
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "they do not have a suicidal plan, "
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtIntentToDie") = "" then
        SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "their intent to die was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtIntentToDie") = "yes" then
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "they have intent to die, "
        else
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "they do not have intent to die, "
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtMeansToKillSelf") = "" then
        SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "and their means to kill themself was not specified."
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtMeansToKillSelf") = "yes" then
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "and they have the means to kill themself."
        else
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "and they do not have the means to kill themself."
        end if
    end if

    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtHomicidalIdeation") = "" then
        HomicideNarrative = "The patient's homicidal ideation was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtHomicidalIdeation") = "None" then
            HomicideNarrative = "The patient has no homicidal ideation, "
        else 
            if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtHomicidalIdeation") = "Active" then
                HomicideNarrative = "The patient has active homicidal ideation, "
            else
                HomicideNarrative = "The patient has passive homicidal ideation, "
            end if
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtPlanToHurt") = "" then
        HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "their homicidal plan was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtPlanToHurt") = "yes" then
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "they have a homicidal plan, "
        else
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "they do not have a homicidal plan, "
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtPlanToHurt") = "" then
        HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "their intent to hurt someone was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtPlanToHurt") = "yes" then
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "they have intent to hurt someone, "
        else
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "they do not have intent to hurt someone, "
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtMeansToHurt") = "" then
        HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "and their means to hurt someone was not specified."
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtMeansToHurt") = "yes" then
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "and they have the means to hurt someone."
        else
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "and they do not have the means to hurt someone."
        end if
    end if
    theForm("txtaThoughtHurtNarr") = SuicideNarrative & " " & HomicideNarrative
End sub

private sub generateRiskSources()
    Narrative = ""
    if theForm("chkRiskNoEvidence") then
        Narrative = Narrative & " No evidence of acute risk of harm to self or others,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkRiskFunctional") then
        Narrative = Narrative & " Risk of functional impairment with threat of job loss or school failure,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkRiskSubstance") then
        Narrative = Narrative & " Risk of substance abuse relapse,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkSuicidalIdeation") then
        Narrative = Narrative & " Suicidal ideation,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkRiskIllness") then
        Narrative = Narrative & " Risk of medical illness exacerbation due to psychiatric illness,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkRiskDisruption") then
        Narrative = Narrative & " Risk of family disruption or deterioriation,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkRiskViolence") then
        Narrative = Narrative & " Risk of violence,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkRiskVicitimization") then
        Narrative = Narrative & " Risk of traumatic victimization due to psychiatric illness,"
    end if
    If Right(Narrative, 1) = "," Then
    Narrative = Left(Narrative, Len(Narrative) - 1)
    End If
    If Narrative = "" then 
    Narrative = Narrative & "Not specified."
    end if
    theForm("txtaRiskSourceNarrative") = Narrative
end sub

End Class

{"ServerScript":"Class FormScriptEvents

Private Sub OnSave()
    generateNarratives()
End Sub

Private Sub OnCreate()
    PullForward()
End Sub

Private Sub PullForward()
On Error Resume Next
    Dim data
    data = theForm.execSQL("cstm__pullForwardMentalStatusExam @ownerObjectGUID  = '" & theForm.DataStore.OwnerObjectGUID.tostring & "', @userguid = '" & theForm.User.UserGUID.ToString & "'")
    If data.Rows.Count > 0 Then
        For x = 0 To data.Rows.Count - 1            
            if isnumeric(data.Rows(x).Item("Value")) then
                theForm(data.Rows(x).Item("Key")) = cint(data.rows(x).Item("Value"))
            else
                theForm(data.Rows(x).Item("Key")) = data.rows(x).Item("Value")
            end if        
        Next
    End If
End Sub

Private Sub generateNarratives()
    generateNarrativeAppearance()
    generateNarrativeBehavior()
    generateSpeech()
    generateMood()
    generateAffect()
    generateThoughtProcess()
    generateThoughtContent()
    generateThoughtHurt()
    generateInsight()
    generateConsciousness()
    generateOrientation()
    generateMemory()
    generateAttention()
    generateLanguageNaming()
    generateLanguageRepeating()
    generateLanguageAbstraction()
    generateFundKnowledge()
    generateGait()
    generateMuscleStrength()
    generateMuscleTone()
    generateRiskSources()
End Sub
Private Sub generateNarrativeAppearance()
    Narrative = ""
    if theForm("chkAppearAppropriateDress") then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Appropriate dress,"
    end if 
    if theForm("chkAppearAdequateGrooming")  then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Adequate grooming and hygiene,"
    end if 
    if theForm("chkAppearDisheveled")  then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Disheveled,"
    end if 
    if theForm("chkAppearOther")  then
    Narrative = Narrative & " " & theForm("txtaAppearOther")
    end if 
    If Right(Narrative, 1) = "," Then
    Narrative = Left(Narrative, Len(Narrative) - 1)
    End If
    If Narrative = "" then 
    Narrative = Narrative & "Not specified."
    end if
    theForm("txtaAppearNarr") = Narrative
End Sub
Private Sub generateNarrativeBehavior()
    Narrative = ""
    if theForm("chkBehaviorCooperative") then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Cooperative,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkBehaviorNormalPsychomotor") then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Normal psychomotor activity,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkBehaviorWithdrawn") then

    end if
    if theForm("chkBehaviorIntermittentEyeContact") then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Intermitten eye Contact,"
    end if
     if theForm("chkBehaviorInvoluntaryMovement") then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Involuntary movements,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkBehaviorGoodEyeContact") then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Good eye contact,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkBehaviorUncooperative") then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Uncooperative,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkBehaviorPoorEyeContact") then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Poor eye contact,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkBehaviorElevatedPsychomotor") then
    Narrative = Narrative & " Elevated pschomotor activity,"
    end if
    if theForm("chkBehaviorOther") then
    Narrative = Narrative & " "  & theForm("txtaBehaviorOther")
    end if
    If Right(Narrative, 1) = "," Then
    Narrative = Left(Narrative, Len(Narrative) - 1)
    End If
    If Narrative = "" then 
    Narrative = Narrative & "Not specified."
    end if
    theForm("txtaBehaviorNarr") = Narrative
End Sub

Private Sub generateThoughtHurt()
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtSuicidalIdeation") = "" then
        SuicideNarrative = "The patient's suicidal ideation was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtSuicidalIdeation") = "None" then
            SuicideNarrative = "The patient has no suicidal ideation, "
        else 
            if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtSuicidalIdeation") = "Active" then
                SuicideNarrative = "The patient has active suicidal ideation, "
            else
                SuicideNarrative = "The patient has passive suicidal ideation, "
            end if
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtSuicidalPlan") = "" then
        SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "their suicidal plan was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtSuicidalPlan") = "yes" then
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "they have a suicidal plan, "
        else
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "they do not have a suicidal plan, "
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtIntentToDie") = "" then
        SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "their intent to die was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtIntentToDie") = "yes" then
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "they have intent to die, "
        else
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "they do not have intent to die, "
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtMeansToKillSelf") = "" then
        SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "and their means to kill themself was not specified."
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtMeansToKillSelf") = "yes" then
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "and they have the means to kill themself."
        else
            SuicideNarrative = SuicideNarrative & "and they do not have the means to kill themself."
        end if
    end if

    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtHomicidalIdeation") = "" then
        HomicideNarrative = "The patient's homicidal ideation was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtHomicidalIdeation") = "None" then
            HomicideNarrative = "The patient has no homicidal ideation, "
        else 
            if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtHomicidalIdeation") = "Active" then
                HomicideNarrative = "The patient has active homicidal ideation, "
            else
                HomicideNarrative = "The patient has passive homicidal ideation, "
            end if
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtPlanToHurt") = "" then
        HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "their homicidal plan was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtPlanToHurt") = "yes" then
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "they have a homicidal plan, "
        else
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "they do not have a homicidal plan, "
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtPlanToHurt") = "" then
        HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "their intent to hurt someone was not specified, "
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtPlanToHurt") = "yes" then
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "they have intent to hurt someone, "
        else
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "they do not have intent to hurt someone, "
        end if
    end if
    if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtMeansToHurt") = "" then
        HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "and their means to hurt someone was not specified."
    else 
        if theForm("cmbThoughtHurtMeansToHurt") = "yes" then
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "and they have the means to hurt someone."
        else
            HomicideNarrative = HomicideNarrative & "and they do not have the means to hurt someone."
        end if
    end if
    theForm("txtaThoughtHurtNarr") = SuicideNarrative & " " & HomicideNarrative
End sub
